context: The word 'suudelda' is an infinitive verb in Estonian that means 'to kiss'. It's used to express the action of kissing someone. In different contexts, it can be conjugated into various forms such as 'suudelen' (I kiss), 'suudad' (you kiss), 'suudelab' (he/she kisses), etc. The word is commonly used in romantic contexts but can also refer to friendly cheek kisses or other types of kissing depending on the context.
